module.name: finite_elements
module.keywords: module, finite elements, nodes, h-version finite elements, discretised mesh

abstract.li: nodes, h-version finite elements, and the associated element material and geometric property representations that combine to form a discretised mesh;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of associated administrative information, nodes, h-version finite elements, material and geometric property representations that combine to form a discretised mesh

inscope.li: nodes, h-version finite elements, and the associated element material and geometric property representations that combine to form a discretised mesh;
